page.title: Read about us page
page.description: The description is used as meta description
page.content:
FWProblems is an online web blog created on September 28, 2014 as part of the 2014 Hackathon.

Our posts aim to address the problems prevalent in first-world countries.
Although these problem are trivial compared to starvation, war, and poverty,
all problems deserve an answer.

FWProblem is the response; with our nonsensical, and sometimes scientific posts - you'll find the answers you need.
We provide the solutions, with a side of entertainment.
